first_para: Miriam Frances Kennet is an economist and founder of the Green Economics Institute. She is editor of the International Journal of Green Economics, the first peer-reviewed international journal which proposes and fosters discussion on all aspects of green economics. In October 2011, Kennet was nominated as one of One World Action's 100 Most Powerful Women.

full.extract: Miriam Frances Kennet is an economist and founder of the Green Economics Institute. She is editor of the International Journal of Green Economics, the first peer-reviewed international journal which proposes and fosters discussion on all aspects of green economics. In October 2011, Kennet was nominated as one of One World Action's 100 Most Powerful Women.
full.title: Miriam Kennet
